name: Creatory (Yoshicakes 77)
description:
Creatory is a game about building with blocks.

Press "0" for Grass.

Press "1" for Dirt.

Press "2" for Stone.

Press "3" for Red.

Press "4" for Green.

Press "5" for Blue.

Press "6" for Japan Flag.

Press "7" for USA Flag.

Press "8" for Black.

Press "9" for Purple.

Left click to place blocks.

Right click to delete blocks.

Press "F" to fly.

Press "V" to stop flying.

Use the arrow keys to move.

Use the up arrow key to jump.
